SourcedStatement: Before Sam Altman was ousted from OpenAI last week, he and the company’s board of directors had been bickering for more than a year.

SourcedStatement: And some board members worried that Mr. Altman was too focused on expansion while they wanted to balance that growth with A.I. safety.
